title: Lancering campagne
description: 11 februari is het Internationale Dag van Vrouwen en Meisjes in de Wetenschap. De Jonge Academie lanceert dan de campagne Wetenschap = M+V+X.

title: Women in science symposium
description: This symposium, organized by KUL and VIB, intends to shine light on women in science, identify the inequalities and factors that still contribute to the vast under-representation of women in senior-level positions across academia and other occupational sectors.

title: Woman In Science Day
description: On the occasion of the International Day of Women and Girls in Science, the faculty of bio-engineering of UGent is organizing a half-day symposium to encourage and support young women in academia to reach their full potential as scientific researchers and innovators by showcasing female role models and helping young scientists develop a network.

title: Op weg naar gelijkheid in academia?
description: De Vrije Universiteit Brussel, RHEA Expertisecentrum Gender, Diversiteit en Intersectionaliteit en v.z.w. Interuniversitair Centrum voor Onderwijsrecht (ICOR) nodigen u hartelijk uit voor een inspirerend seminarie over gendergelijkheid in de academische wereld.
